title: Kaori Okano and Yoshio Sugimoto, eds., “Rethinking Japanese Studies: Eurocentrism and the Asia-Pacific Region” (Routledge, 2018)
description:
Rethinking Japanese Studies. Eurocentrism and the Asia-Pacific Region (Routledge, 2018) is co-edited by Kaori Okano and Yoshio Sugimoto. The book tries to look at the discipline of Japanese Studies from a variety of perspectives and in a variety of contexts, starting from the premise that – as the authors put...
